import React, { Component } from 'react'; import "./Project.css"; import {motion} from "framer-motion"; export default function Project(){ const onWheel = e => { e.preventDefault(); const container = document.getElementById("project-list"); const containerScrollPosition = document.getElementById("project-list").scrollLeft; container.scrollTo({ top: 0, left: containerScrollPosition + e.deltaY, behaviour: "smooth" }); }; return(
